remarks: Express the predicate:  The limit of complex number sequence ` F ` is ` A ` , or ` F ` converges to ` A ` .  Similar to ~ clim , but without the disjoint var constraint ` F k ` .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
climf.nf $e |- F/_ k F $.
climf.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. V ) $.
climf.fv $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ZZ ) -> ( F ` k ) = B ) $.
climf $p |- ( ph -> ( F ~~> A <-> ( A e. CC /\ A. x e. RR+ E. j e. ZZ A. k e. ( ZZ>= ` j ) ( B e. CC /\ ( abs ` ( B - A ) ) < x ) ) ) ) $.
$d A j k x $.
$d F j x $.
$d j k ph x $.
